metadata.title: Ogbako
metadata.summary: BBC News Igbo na-agbasa akụkọ sị Naịjirịa, Afịrịka na mba ụwa niile... Ihe na-eme ugbua gbasara akụkọ, egwuregwu, ihe nkiri na ihe na-ewu ewu... BBC Nkeji.

headlines.headline: 'Nna m pịara m ụtalị maka ịgba bọọlụ'

items.summary: Kelechi Iheanacho na-agbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ akọwala ihe ọ gabigara aka nne na nna ya mgbe ọ na-amalite ịgba bọọlụ.

media.title: "Nna m na-apịa m ụtalị maka ịgba bọọlụ"

synopses.short: Kelechi Ihenacho: Nna m achbụghị iji ntị anụ na m na-agba bọọlụ
synopses.long:
Kelechi Ihenacho na-agbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ akọwala ihe ọ gabigara aka nne na nna ya mgbe ọ na-amalite ịgba bọọlụ.
Na mkparịta ụka ya na BBC Igbo, Iheanacho sị na na mbụ, nna ya akadoghi ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ.
Mana ugbu a, obi ụtọ na-eme nna ya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye ama ama n'egwuregwu bọọlụ.
Ọ zarakwara ajụjụ banyere alụmnwaanyị ya.  
Kirizie ajụjụ ya ebe a.
synopses.medium: Kelechi Ihenacho na-agbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ akọwala ihe ọ gabigara aka nne na nna ya mgbe ọ na-amalite ịgba bọọlụ.

media.caption: Kelechi Iheanacho: Nna m achọbụghị iji ntị anụ na m na-agba bọọlụ

indexImage.altText: Kelechi Ihenacho na-agbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ akọwala ihe ọ gabigara aka nne na nna ya mgbe ọ na-amalite ịgba bọọlụ.

headlines.headline: 'Super Falcons ka Super Eagles agbata ihe na bọọlụ'

items.summary: Ụfọdụ ụmụnwaanyị ndị ntaakụkọ n'egwuregwu akọwala ụfọdụ nsogbu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị na-enwe na Naịjirịa.

media.title: 'Ụmụnwaanyị na-agba bọọlụ karịa ndị nwoke'

synopses.short: Gọọmentị gbahapụrụ egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị na Naịjirịa.
synopses.long:
N'ajụjụ BBC Igbo gbara ndị a, ha kọwara na ndị mmadụ na-eche na ọ bụ naanị ụmụnwoke maara bọọlụ agba, nke mere na ndị mmadụ karịsịa ụmụnwoke a naghị etinye uche na bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị na Naịjirịa nakwa Afrịka.
Ha gara n'ihu kwuo na gọọmentị a naghị etinye uche nakwa ego n'egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị dịka ha si eme na nke ụmụnwoke. Agbanyeghi na ụmụnwaanyị na-ebute Iko karịa ndị nwoke.
Na ọ bụ ihe ndị a mere anaghị anụ akụkọ banyere asọmpi dị iche iche ụmụnwaanyị na-agba na Naịjrịa nakwa mba Afrịka ndị ọzọ.
synopses.medium: Ụfọdụ ụmụnwaanyị ndị ọnụ na-eru n'okwu n'egwuregwu akọwala ụfọdụ nsogbu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị na-enwe na Naịjirịa.

media.caption: Gọọmentị gbahapụrụ egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị na Naịjirịa.

indexImage.altText: Falcons bụ otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa

headlines.headline: 'Ugbua anyị amatala na ego dị n'iti egwu'

items.summary: Okpuozor na Akunwafor Obiligbo gwara BBC ihe na-akpalite mmụọ ha n'iti ụdị egwu ha na-eti.

media.title: "Anyị ejeghị nga na mba ofesi, ọ bụ asịrị"

synopses.short: Ụmụ Obiligbo: Anyị ejeghị nga na mba ofesi, ọ bụ asịrị
synopses.medium: Okpuozor na Akunwafor Obiligbo gwara BBC ihe na-akpalite mmụọ ha n'iti ụdị egwu ha na-eti.
synopses.long:
Okpuozor na Akunwafor bụ ụmụ ụmụ Ezigbo Obiligbo na-eti egwu Igbo. 
Ha kọwara BBC Igbo etu ha si malite ịgụ egwu mgbe ha gụchara ụlọakwụkwọ. 
Umu Obiligbo kọwara ụfọdụ ọgbatuhie ha gabigara na njem egwu a.
Gee ihe ha kwuru n'uju ebe a:

media.caption: Ụmụ Obiligbo: Anyị ejeghị nga na mba ofesi, ọ bụ asịrị

headlines.headline: Ihe mere Naira Marley ka ji nọrọ na mkpọrọ

items.summary: Oti egwu Naira Marley ka nọ mkpọrọ agbanyeghị na ọkaikpe Nicholas Oweibo tụhapụrụ ya ka o siri ụlo na-abịa ikpe ya.

headlines.headline: 'Ihe m rọrọ na nrọ pụtara ihe ka afọ 14 gara'

items.summary: Janine Van Wyk ga-edu mba South Africa ga Iko Mba Ụwa nke mbụ ha.

media.title: 'Ihe m rọrọ na nrọ pụtara ihe ka afọ 14 gara'

synopses.short: Women's World Cup: Nrọ Iko Mba Ụwa nke Janine van Wyk, onye ndu ụmụnwaanyị South Africa
synopses.medium: Janine Van Wyk ga-edu mba South Africa ga Iko Mba Ụwa nke mbụ ha.
synopses.long:
Janine van Wyk agbarala otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị mba Sawụt Afịrịka bọolụ ruo afọ 14. 
Mana n'oge a, nke mbụ, onye ndụ otu egwuregwu Banyana Banyana ga-edu ha gaa Iko Mba Ụwa.
Ọ kọrọ ebumnobi ya, na njem ya n'akụkọ a.

media.caption: Janine Van Wyk ga-edu mba South Africa ga Iko Mba Ụwa nke mbụ ha.

headlines.headline: 'Anyị lụtaara nwa m nwoke nwaanyị maka na ọ mụtaghi nwa tupu ọ nwụọ'

items.summary: Felicia Orji kowara ihe mere o ji soro usoro omenala wee lụtara nwa ya nwoke nwụrụ nwaanyị ka aha ya ghara ifu.

media.title: 'Anyị lụtaara nwa m nwoke nwaanyị maka na ọ mụtaghi nwe tupu o nwụọ'

synopses.short: Omenala Igbo: Nwa m amụtaghị nwa tupu ọ nwụọ, anyị wee lụtara ya nwaanyị ga-amụtara ya nwa
synopses.long:
Omenala Igbo dị omimi.. Ọtụtụ ihe dị n'ime Omenala bụ ihe ndị mgbe ochie wepụtara iji nye ndị mmadụ ohere ịchọputa ụzọ mmezi ihe ọbụla na-enye ha nsogbu. 
Out n'ime omenala a bụ nke na-enye ohere ka alụọrọ onye enweghị ike ya nwaanyị - ọkachasị onye amụghị nwa tupu ọ nwụọ.
Felicia Orji gwara BBC Igbo ihe mere o Jiri soro usoro omenala a.
Gee ya ntị n'ihe nkiri a.
synopses.medium: Felicia Orji kowari ihe mere ya Jiri soro usoro omenala wee lụtara nwa ya nwoke nwụru nwaanyị iji hụ na aha ya gharị ịla.

media.caption: Nwaanyị lụtara nwa ya nwụrụ nwaanyị

headlines.headline: Nwaada ji ịkpụ arụsị Ndigbo egosi ụwa njirimara Igbo

items.summary: Jane Ada bụ nwafọ Igbo bi n'Amerịka ji aka ọrụ ya kọwaa etu o ji hụta ụfọdụ chi dị n'ala Igbo.

media.title: Jane Ada ji ịkpụ ụzụ na-egosi ụwa arụsị ndị Igbo

synopses.short: Jane Ada: Nwaada Igbo ji ịkpụ ụzụ na-egosi ụwa arụsị e jiri mara ndị Igbo
synopses.long:
Jane Ada bụ onye ejikwa ihe osise mara kwuru na ọ bụ site n'ikpụ ụzụ ka o ji akọwapụta ụfọdụ chi eji mara ndị Igbo.
Jane gụrụ akwụkwọ Sekọndịrị n'Enugwu tupu ọ gaa mba Amerịka na-arụ ọrụ kwuru na ọ maghi mgbe nke ji malite kama na ọ bụ Chineke nyere ya onyinye pụrụiche a.
Arụsị ndị ọ kpụrụla gụnyere Amadioha na Ala,arụsị abụọ a ma ama n'ala Igbo. 

Gee ntị nụrụ ma etu o siri mee nke nakwa ebumnuche ya gbasara omenaala na asụsụ Igbo.
synopses.medium: Jane Ada bụ nwafọ Igbo na-akpụ ụzụ pụrụiche bi n'Amerịka ji aka ọrụ ya kọwaa etu o ji hụta ụfọdụ chi ndị dị n'ala Igbo.

media.caption: Jane Ada: Nwaada Igbo ji ịkpụ ụzụ na-egosi ụwa arụsị e jiri mara ndị Igbo

items.summary: Ụkọchukwu Festus Ezeamaka bụ onye ndu ụlọ ụka Saint Jude na Nnewi gwara BBC Igbo etu esi wakpo ya.

headlines.headline: Ịṅụ ọgwụ mgbochi aghara aghara na-eme ka ọ ghara ịrụ ọrụ

items.summary: Dọkịnta oyibo ekwuola ihe mere ọgwụ mgbochi anaghịzị arụ ọrụ ka o kwesiri.

headlines.headline: Kedu ebe ndị Oguta si?

items.summary: Ajie Aneke kọwara BBC Igbo njem ndị Ugwuta, etu ha si bilie si Bini bịa ebe ha bi ugbua, nakwa ọrụ nwaanyị rụrụ n'ọpụpụ ha.

media.title: Kedu ebe ndị Ugwuta si?

synopses.short: History of Ogwuta: Etu esi hibe ebe a na-akpọ Ugwuta taa
synopses.long:
Ọtụtụ obodo n'Igbo ma ebe nna nna ha si, ndị ọzọ makakwara etu ndị be ha Jiri malite ibi ebe ha bi ugbua.
Ajie Aneke bụ onye Ugwuta kọwara BBC Igbo akụkọ obodo Ugwuta dị na Imo steeti.
Ọ sị na Ugwuta si obodo Bini were rute ebe bụ Ugwuta taa.
Gee ya ntị n'ọnụ.
synopses.medium: Ajie Aneke kọwara BBC Igbo njem ndị Ugwuta, etu ha si bilie si Bini bịa ebe ha bi ugbua.

media.caption: Etu esi hibe ebe a na-akpọ Ugwuta taa

indexImage.caption: 'Gọọmenti so na ihe mere ụlọ ji ada n'Anambra steeti ' Arc. Osita Okafọ

headlines.headline: Ihe ise a ga-eji cheta '8th Assembly'

items.summary: Dịka Ụlọ omeiwu nke asatọ ga-abịa n'isi njebe n'ụbọchị Tọọzde bụ ụbọchị nke isii nke ọnwa Juun 2019, lee ụfọdụ ihe a ga-eji cheta ha.

indexImage.altText: Ndi isi ụlọ omeiwu nke asatọ na onyeisiala Buhari nwere ọtụtụ nghọtahie.
indexImage.caption: Senate President Bukola Saraki and House Speaker Yakubu Dogara

headlines.headline: Ikuku ọjọọ ndị nwere ike ibute ọnwụ

items.summary: Otu dọkịnta akọwaala na anwụrụ a niile nwere ike igbu mmadụ na-erughị otu awa.

headlines.headline: Ihe nwere ike ibute ọnwụ nwaanyị di ya hapụrụ ka ọ mụọ nwa n'ụlọ - Dọkịnta

items.summary: Dọkịta ọkacha n'ahụike ụmụnwaanyị bụ Osita Umeọnọniru kọwaara ihe nwereike ibute ọnwụ nwaanyị nọ na-amụ nwa n'ụlọ n'Ebonyi steeti.

headlines.headline: Ụbọchị ncheta Biafra: Ka o si gaa

items.summary: Ka o si aga n'ihe gbasara ncheta Biafra na Naijiria na ụwa gburugburu taa bụ Mee 30, nke afọ 2019.

headlines.headline: Ụzọ ịse ị ga-esi debe onwe gị ọcha na nsọ

items.summary: Ijeamaka Nwizu na-arụ n'ụlọọrụ enyemaka na-enye ụzọ ise ụmụagbọghọ ga-esi nọrọ ọcha n'oge nsọ ha kwa ọnwa.

indexImage.altText: Akwa nso eji akwa ndị ochie arụpụta
indexImage.caption: Akwa nso eji akwa ndị ochie arụpụta

headlines.headline: Ihe ise mere Ndigbo ji alaghachi n'ịlụ ụbara nwaanyị

items.summary: Ndị ọkachamara na-ekwu na itinye anya ọdinala ochie mere ndị mmadụ iji alọghachị.

headlines.headline: Ihe oke isiọwụwa na-eme n'ụbụrụisi

items.summary: Ndị ọkanmụta n'ahụike akọwaala ihe na-eme n'ụrụisi mmadụ mgbe o nwere oke isiọwụwa a kpọrọ 'Migraine'.

media.title: Ihe oke isiọwụwa na-eme n'ụbụrụisi

synopses.short: Migraine headache: Ihe oke isiọwụwa na-eme n'ụbụrụisi
synopses.long:
Ndị ọkanmụta n'ahụike akọwaala ihe na-eme n'ụrụisi mmadụ mgbe o nwere oke isiọwụwa a kpọrọ 'Migraine'.
Ha sị na ọ bụ ihe na-ebute ụdị isi ọwụwa nke na-eme ka isi ọ na-ekpu mmadụ nakwa nke ọzọ na-enụ onye ahụ agbọ.
synopses.medium: Ndị ọkanmụta n'ahụike akọwaala ihe na-eme n'ụrụisi mmadụ mgbe o nwere oke isiọwụwa a kpọrọ 'Migraine'.

media.caption: Migraine headache: Ihe oke isiọwụwa na-eme n'ụbụrụisi

headlines.headline: 'Ezigbo ọchịchị kwesịrị ịbụ maka ndị ị na-achị' - Ernest Ezeajughi

items.summary: Onye Igbo bụ Mayor nke obodo Brent dị na London akọwaala etu o si nweta ọkwa ahụ.

media.title: Etum si bụrụ Mayor na London - Ernest Ezeajughi

synopses.short: Ernest Ezeajughi: Etum si bụrụ Mayor na London.
synopses.long:
Ezigbo obi aṅụrị tọrọ ọtụtụ ndị Igbo dịka ha nwetere ozi na onye Ibo abụrụla Mayor n'Obodo Brent dị na mba UK.
Mgbe BBC Igbo gara ịnụta ọnụ okwu nwa amadị a, ọ gwara anyị ka nya bụ okpu eze si dakwasa ya n'isi.
O nyekwara ụmụ Naịjirịa bi na mba ofesi ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche.
synopses.medium: Onye Igbo bụrụla Mayor Brent dị na London akọwala etu o si nweta ọkwa ahụ.

media.caption: Ernest Ezeajughi: Etum si bụrụ Mayor na London.

headlines.headline: Ikpọtụrụ BBC Igbo

items.summary: Ikpọtụrụ BBC Igbo.

headlines.headline: Lee 'ọgbanje’ Igbo ji eme ọnụ

items.summary: Akwaeke Emezi ga-arụ dịka onye odide na onye nchịkọta ihe ejije si n'akwụkwọ o biputara a ga-egosi n'Amerịka.

headlines.headline: Arsenal agwala Valencia na 'ogologo abụghị na nwa m etoola', Chelsea lara na nta

items.summary: Arsenal ejirila iwe gbakasịa Valencia ahụ, ebe Chelsea nọ na-ebigharị aka na Germany n'asọmpi Europa League.

headlines.headline: Barcelona etiela Liverpool ịgba

items.summary: Ụwa agbaala Liverpool gharịị ka Barcelona enyeghi ha efe kuru mmiri tọgbọ iko ka ha nabatara ha na Nou Camp.

indexImage.caption: Messi nyere ọkpụ goolu abụọ n'ime atọ Barca jiri chie Liverpool ọnụ n'ala.

headlines.headline: Man City anarala Burnley ube racha

items.summary: Man City merie asọmpi abụọ nọ ha n'ihu, ha tụrụ ugo Premier League nke afọ 2019 tinyere nke 2018 dị ha n'aka.

headlines.headline: Everton abọkasịala Man United ka ọkụkọ 'Easter'

items.summary: Everton anyụọla Man United ịkpakwụ n'isụnye ha ọkpụ goolu anọ asataghị otu n'asọmpi Premier League.

headlines.headline: Arsenal ihe a ọ bụ ụkwụ nnama ji aga Aba?

items.summary: Arsenal ewerela otu ọkpụ ọkpụ ha nwetara "n'agba ekpere chi" menyụọ Watford anya na be ha.

headlines.headline: Arsenal asụọla Napoli akwụ n'Emirates

items.summary: Arsenal ji ọkpụ abụọ kpapịa Napoli ume ebe Chelsea jisi ike were otu ọkpụ hichapụ onwe ha ihere.
